fields: id: Unique identifier applied to the rendered slide element.
ariaLabel: Accessible label describing the slide's content for assistive tech.
eyebrow: Short label shown above the title, typically the content category.
title: Primary headline for the slide.
tagline: Supporting sentence that further describes the slide focus.
tags: Optional themed tags rendered as pills under the tagline.
includeSearch: When true, includes the hero search form for this slide.
ctaText: Label used for the call-to-action button.
ctaIcon: Optional icon identifier for the CTA button.
buttonHref: Primary link target for the slide CTA (use relative paths within the site).
ctaHref: Legacy link field kept for backward compatibility; buttonHref takes precedence when both are set.
image: Background image file path stored under assets/images/hero/ (use relative paths like "assets/images/hero/example.jpg").
imageTone: Set to 'dark' when the background is dark (uses light text) or 'light' when the background is bright (uses dark text).
buttonColor: Choose 'dark' for a deep teal CTA (#0D474E) or 'light' for a high-contrast green CTA (#17856D); both render with white text.
overlayIntensity: Optional number between 0 (no overlay) and 1 (full preset overlay) that controls the slide background overlay strength; defaults to the theme preset when omitted.
isActive: When true the slide is preselected as the active slide.
credit: Object describing image attribution (prefix, name, URLs, etc.).
